name: Innovating in FinX
description: Stronger communities w/ better financial tools.

readme.text:
## Developer III at Q2ebanking 
 [Q2](https://www.q2ebanking.com/) provides a banking platform that interfaces personal and professional banking needs into a single tool. They then offer this as a customizable software as a service to banks and credit unions big or small. Community banks who would have otherwise had to outsource or hire a team to build a platform with potential security holes and poor usability are a thing of the past. 

 ![Mobile banking software](./assets/finx1.jpg) 

 Built **Ember.js** & **Vue.js** powered banking software used by tens of millions worldwide. _Mentored_ new hires, reforged **automation testing** standards, improved A11y. 

 Gave company-wide internal presentations around new initiatives, features and development strategies. Co-organized an internal developer convention. 

 ![Desktop banking software](./assets/finx2.jpg) 

 Lead an innovative [HTML5 Web Components project](https://wrotenwrites.com/web-components/) to achieve ambitious cross-team goals.
